sentences.en: As to all the rest, he was humble and contrite.
sentences.cn: 至于平时, 他总是低首下心,深自负疚的样子.
我尽量做出歉疚的样子.

sentences.en: It was a contrite little note from Sue.
sentences.cn: 那是苏写的一封表示悔恨的短信.
她装出一副后悔的表情.

sentences.en: She must be humble and contrite.
sentences.cn: 她一定得卑躬屈节,自怨自艾.

sentences.en: She was contrite the morning after her angry outburst.
sentences.cn: 她发了一顿脾气之后一早上追悔莫及.

sentences.en: She was contrite the whole morning after her angry outburst.
sentences.cn: 她发了一通脾气之后整个早上都追悔莫及.

sentences.en: She was instantly contrite. "Oh, I am sorry! You must forgive me."
sentences.cn: 她马上就懊悔了。“哦，我很抱歉！你一定要原谅我。”

sentences.en: The look she gave Anna was guilty and contrite.
sentences.cn: 她给安娜的脸色是内疚和愧悔的.

sentences.en: The sorrow of a contrite heart.
The sorrow of a contrite Listent.
The tall, gracious young woman listened attentively to these contrite words.
sentences.cn: 身材修长, 气度高雅的少妇静听着这些带着悔意的言语.

sentences.en: There stood Shirley in the gallery , looking contrite, ashamed, sorry as any repentant child.
sentences.cn: 谢利站在过道上,象个悔悟的小孩那样, 显得后悔, 羞渐, 难受.

sentences.en: This week a contrite Mr Lee said he would listen to the public's concerns.
sentences.cn: 本周,深表懊悔的李明博总统表示将会听取民众所关心的问题.

trans.tran_en: feeling guilty and sorry for something bad that you have done
